Description of incident: A breach of the Teachers Retirement System (TRS) of Texas has been discovered.  A retired principal learned that the TRS had mailed an envelope to her bank.  Due to the window-style of the envelope, her personal information was clearly visible through the TRS envelope.  The number of people affected by TRS's practice is unknown.  TRS changed their procedures so that content cannot be seen from the outside of the envelope.  TRS also plans to take the sensitive information off of letters in the future.
